name: CareTaker's Fetch Quest
description:
This is a short game I made in dedication to someone special to me. 

The controls are:

W - Move forward
A - Move Left
S - Move Backwards
D - Move Right

Spacebar- Jump

Left Mouse Button (LMB) - Grab/Drop



There's no pausing; this game is not time sensitive.
There's no saving.
If you need to exit out of it, just ALT+F4

Tip:
Items are hidden in various spots within the castle. So if you don't find it in one room, make sure to check every corner in other rooms nearby. Jumps are necessary.
_______

The music is AI generated from SoundDraw and then modified in audacity.
